data.actual_result: The app either crashes to the home screen or a purple screen
data.expected_result: The pinned messages open and close quickly
data.short_description: When opening and closing the pinned messages section quickly, sometimes it crashes, usually goes to a purple screen  (iPhone6S, iOS 10.0.2,TestFlight)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the channel tab - Check pinned messages - Close pinned messages - Repeat quickly
